name: Stromatolite LTD
goal: Since 2000, first as partnership then as Limited Company, Stromatolite has focused on design and technology innovation for large multinationals. Since 2012 Stromatolite has been building Innovation Ecosystems around industry testbeds, incorporating creative seeding of ideas and Innovation for the physical Internet.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Culture, Enterprise, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: The Stromatolite CEO has been contributing to AI recommendations for the CONNECT Advisory Forum (CAF) and to AI Innovation Recommendations for the G7 leaders during 2017/2018; coordinating the Innovation Recommendations for the CONNECT Advisory Forum (CAF) for the H2020 programme 2018-2020; and in charge of CAF recommendations for IoT business models for the programme 2016-2017. The Stromatolite CEO has been one of the founders of the AIOTI - the Alliance of Internet of Things Innovation and Co-Chair of the AIOTI Innovation Ecosystems group.
